We’re Hiring

Driven by the vision of a better way to learn online, we're building a dramatically new kind of online classroom, focused on live discussion.

As a founding team member at OneRoom, you'll make significant contributions to our application. You'll be involved in every major decision, from which frameworks to use, to the build process, to how we test. You'll work side-by-side with our designer to translate an ambitious vision into reality, and help to shape that vision. If you want to work with a small team dedicated to product excellence and delighting customers, we'd love to hear from you. This is the beginning of a fun ride. Come join us!

The Team

Jeff and Scott were the 1st and 3rd employees of Opower, where they worked together building software that has so far saved more than 5 terawatt-hours of energy.

Opower left them with a firm belief in the potential for software to achieve broadly positive social good. With OneRoom we aim to do the same for education.
